chaofanmod:card.AhhMyEyes.NAME: Ahh My Eyes
chaofanmod:card.AhhMyEyes.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you shoot screen with phone, Lose 10 max HP.

chaofanmod:card.RiskManagement.NAME: Risk Management
chaofanmod:card.RiskManagement.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage to ALL enemies equal to your mod count.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage to ALL enemies equal to your mod count. NL (Deal !D! damage.)

chaofanmod:card.SearingBlowFor2048.NAME: Searing Blow
chaofanmod:card.SearingBlowFor2048.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Cannot be Upgraded.

chaofanmod:card.ManualOfMerchantCard.NAME: Pay
chaofanmod:card.ManualOfMerchantCard.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! Gold. NL Gain [E] at the start of your turn.

chaofanmod:ExhaustCounterMod.DESCRIPTION: NL This card is Exhausted after played %d times.
